alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:35AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Palm Beach County through 1215 PM EDT... At 1134 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Belle Glade, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta and Belle Glade Camp. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
